ygData.messageBody:
Ok I have to complain about this even if it is a rumor. Wizards can kill
steal very easy at any level. As well as Enc. Mages, Necs, and Druids(I'm
sure any spell casting class can).

Why should those of us who don't abuse the class suffer because of the
idiots? The only time I have ever killed someone elses crit without asking
is if they dropped to 2 bubbles or less and the Crit was still above half.
Everytime I was thanked because they would rather me get the Exp for the
kill than them lose 1/4 a bubble of exp and have to retrieve their stuff....
Matter of fact the only place I've seen as a KS problem is in dungeons.

!!!!!NEWSFLASH!!!!
Anatomy of a KS-
In BB When a tank comes down to the bridge with a few gnolls in tow for his
party to beat on Mr. KS Spellcaster will target what? That's right the
biggest toughest thing in the group: Usually the Gnoll Elite or the
Commander. When I see something like this I just turn auto attack off and
let the Elite or whatever go play with the caster. I guarantee a few deaths
like this and attitudes will change.

Why is it that hard? This was not meant to be a mindless game. It was meant
to be thought about. Does anyone think anymore???

I agree with the Hill Giant assessment: Once we're OOM we're toast by even
the smallest crit.

Reducing the effectiveness of the Wizard class at higher levels will more
than upset me... I'll be changing classes. I suppose no one complains about
the fact that Druids once they reach Level 14 can solo MOB's that con Red
and are 3-5 levels above them? I look at the high level players in game and
Druids are right up there in the 40's and I've rarely seen a Wiz over 35.
Don't punish the whole class for a few of the Asses out there.

This better just be a rumor or all the hardwork I've done so far is for
not.....


Cinius
